name: chatgpt2
description: ChatGPT2 is a powerful AI model by OpenAI that generates human-like responses for a wide range of text inputs. It can be used for content creation, automation, chatbots, and coding assistance.

name: Copy.ai
description: Copy.ai is an AI-powered writing tool that helps users generate marketing copy, blog content, and product descriptions quickly and efficiently.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper is an AI content generation platform designed for marketers and businesses. It supports various use-cases such as email marketing, ad copy, and long-form content.

name: Synthesia
description: Synthesia enables users to create professional AI videos from text in minutes. It is widely used for training, marketing, and internal communications.

name: Pictory
description: Pictory is an AI-powered video editing tool that transforms long-form content into short, shareable videos. Ideal for content marketers and creators.

name: Runway ML
description: Runway ML offers creative AI tools for video and image editing. It's popular among designers and content creators for its Gen-2 AI and real-time capabilities.

name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly is an AI writing assistant that helps improve grammar, tone, and clarity across emails, documents, and websites.

name: Notion AI
description: Notion AI integrates into the Notion workspace to help users write, summarize, brainstorm, and automate notes and tasks.

name: Perplexity AI
description: Perplexity AI is a real-time AI search engine that provides concise, cited answers using a large language model. It offers clarity and transparency by linking to sources.

name: Lexica
description: Lexica is a prompt search engine and image generator based on Stable Diffusion. It lets users explore AI-generated art and find prompts used by others.

name: Cleanup.pictures
description: Cleanup.pictures is an AI tool for removing unwanted objects and backgrounds from images with minimal effort.

name: MagickPen
description: MagickPen is an AI writing tool focused on helping users create blog posts, essays, and professional content with ease.

name: Tome
description: Tome is an AI-powered storytelling and presentation tool that turns ideas into beautifully formatted, interactive slide decks.

name: Scribe AI
description: Scribe AI automatically captures your workflows and creates step-by-step visual guides, ideal for SOPs and training documentation.

name: ChatPDF
description: ChatPDF lets users interact with PDF documents using natural language queries, making it easier to extract and summarize information.
